flow.descriptionCdata:
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.1311c527-4faf-412b-a2b5-c1a3571aa834.description=
This operation iterates through a list of values. It is not recommended to modify the value of the "list" and "separator" inputs during the iteration process.

Inputs\:
    list - The list to iterate through.
    separator - A delimiter separating the list elements.
Default value\: ‘,’ (comma) 

Results\:
    resultString - The current list element (if the response is "has more").

Responses\:
    has more - Another value was found in the list and it has been returned.
    no more - The iterator has gone through the entire list. This response is returned once per list iteration.  A subsequent call to the List iterator operation restarts the list iteration process.
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully.

Note\:
   The position of the iterator in the list is tracked by each step's unique identifier. Therefore, you can simultaneously iterate through the same list from multiple steps.
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.1ed18b58-8e13-4189-a2d2-9f9efa1629bb.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
    string1 - The first string. 
Default value\: "" (empty)
    string2 - The second string.
Default value\: "" (empty)
    ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

Responses\:
    true - If the two strings are equal.
    false - If the two strings are not equal.
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.25e50507-a8dc-4754-8bed-27bd015951ec.transition.description=maintenance window e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.331bc895-b26b-4ff3-b828-41a960000bb8.description=Checks Checks the Maintainence Windows, Valid Run time and Public Holidays for given workflow. 
Inputs\:
    workflowName - Name of the workflow to check.

Results\:
    automationFailureFlag	- Falg Value
    errorMessage	- Any error messages which caught during execution.

Responses\:
    public holiday 	- If flow running day is public holiday
    invalid run time	- If flow running time/day is invalid
    flow can run	- Flow can run
    maintenance window 	- If flow running day/time is under Maintainence
    automation failure 	- Automation Failed (Other Error)
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.33fdbb5c-9549-4c89-bd8f-09409ed6b90d.transition.description=invalid run time e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.383bbaca-964b-4e92-9296-a03d9ac6cb42.description=Starts the Parallel executions of the given flow in OO central based on the input list. 
Inputs\:
    workflowName 	- Name of the workflow to check.
    list - Comma Seprated list 
            Ex\: List of emails.
    numOfInstancesPerRun	- number of instances can run at same time.
    centralFlowPath 	- UUID or Complete Path of the flow in Central 
    flowInputName 	- Name of the input variable to pass the list values.


Results\:
    failedItems	- Number of list items failed
    successfullItems	- Number of list items successfull


Responses\:
    success 	- Opration executed successfully.
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.3f981e80-fd59-4c92-aedb-08c85a07a9b8.description=
This is an operation that does nothing. It can be used for filtering flow variables by feeding them in as inputs and filtering them on the results tab.

Responses\:
    success
    failure
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.58534fc5-900e-4df8-9424-02f5a3b36c30.callout=JavaScript included to slice the db requets based on threads e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.6af0c6d0-6c83-43ba-93a1-4d969c4cb5d5.transition.description=js error e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.752ca3b0-1f73-46df-a1c0-03080e787138.transition.description=automation failure e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.7fad2cb8-4208-495f-84fc-b08b4874aa80.transition.description=has more e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.97c7cf51-b1df-4ea9-a645-648a718972bd.transition.description=rowcount \= 0 e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.b0663c12-c0ca-483e-a574-dcbefc3c8332.description=
Checks if a number or word is greater than another number or word. Word comparison is case-sensitive in alphabetical order.

Inputs\:
value1 - The first value.
value2 - The second value.

Returns\:
value1 > value2

Responses\:
success - The boolean operation was evaluated to true.
failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false.
e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.c169573b-4266-4a8d-9924-6892b1bd0249.transition.description=automation failure e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.c400f50c-4ba4-4d62-b654-789cea8ed7f8.transition.description=no more e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.cc5ceb53-abb5-42e1-84f4-b38f6c33a6c8.transition.description=success e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.d851a300-fbf4-4b34-b017-581240439044.transition.description=rowcount > 0 e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.ec408eeb-9980-4498-a03d-4c332a7004ca.transition.description=db failure e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.f52c737f-174a-452f-9e56-96fa4663c69b.transition.description=public holiday e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.f91d5e5e-163f-4b5c-bb87-5e418f29feb6.transition.description=flow can run e220cfbc-f08e-475c-8b8e-8a667a51069a.fca75d1f-95ec-4640-aeb7-6dc7ab69e70c.transition.description=automation failure
